description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Lightning, Thunder, Weapon

Standard

Reach 4

+26 vs AC; 3d6 + 8 lightning and thunder damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Lightning, Thunder

Standard, At-Will

Ranged 10

+24 vs Reflex; 2d6 + 8 lightning and thunder damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares and dazed (save ends).

At-Will

Standard, At-Will

The storm titan thunder tempest makes a basic attack, teleports half its speed, and makes a basic attack against a different target.

At-Will ✦ Thunder

Immediate Reaction

Close blast 5

Trigger: When the storm titan thunder tempest is hit by an attack, at-will

+24 vs Fortitude; 1d12 + 7 thunder damage, and the target is knocked prone.

LightningPolymorphThunder

Standard, Recharges When The Storm Titan Thunder Tempest Uses Thunder Tempest

Area burst 2 within 20

Trigger: When the storm titan thunder tempest uses thunder tempest

+24 vs Reflex; 2d12 + 7 lightning damage, the target is knocked prone, and the target takes ongoing 10 thunder damage and is deafened (save ends both). Miss: Half damage. Effect: The thunder tempest teleports to a square adjacent to or in the burst.

system.rechargeCondition: When The Storm Titan Thunder Tempest Uses Thunder Tempest

description.value:
At-Will ✦ Lightning, Thunder

Targets triggering attacker

Trigger: When hit by a melee attack

+24 vs. Reflex; 1d10 + 5 lightning damage, 1d10 + 5 thunder damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Polymorph

Move

The storm titan thunder tempest takes the form of a Gargantuan thunder cloud, then flies its speed. While in this form, it is insubstantial and can occupy spaces occupied by other creatures. A creature that shares a square with the cloud loses lightning resistance (save ends). A creature that starts its turn in the thunder tempest's space is slid 3 squares. The storm titan thunder tempest resumes its titan form immediately after making an attack other than lightning flesh.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied

Thunder tempest recharges and the storm titan uses it. The titan's attacks deal 10 extra thunder damage until the end of the encounter.
